1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural entrepreneurs, Aries are often good at making money, but can be impulsive and reckless in their spending.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Pragmatic and responsible with finances, Tauruses tend to save and invest wisely, but may struggle with sharing their wealth.
3. Gemini - 5/10 - Geminis are often financially scattered, trying many things without committing fully, which can lead to a lack of stability.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Cancers have strong emotional connections to money, and can be overly attached to material possessions, but also tend to save and plan ahead.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Leos are confident spenders who enjoy treating others and themselves, but may need to work on budgeting and planning for the future.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, Virgos excel at managing finances, budgeting, and making smart investments.
7. Libra - 5/10 - Librans are often torn between financial responsibilities and social pressures, which can lead to indecision and uncertainty.
8. Scorpio - 6/10 - Scorpions have a natural ability to spot opportunities and make calculated risks, but may struggle with emotional spending decisions.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians are often good at making financial leaps of faith, but may need to work on long-term planning.
10. Capricorn - 8/10 - Disciplined and responsible, Capricorns tend to prioritize saving and investing over spending and indulgence.
11. Aquarius - 4/10 - Aquarians can be unpredictable with money, making impulsive decisions or ignoring financial responsibilities altogether.
12. Pisces - 3/10 - Dreamy and intuitive, Pisces often struggle with material possessions and financial realities, prioritizing emotions and relationships over fiscal responsibility.
